text: King of the Monsters may refer to: * King of the Monsters (video game), a 1991 video game ** King of the Monsters 2, a 1992 video game * Godzilla, King of the Monsters!, a 1956 film co-produced in the United States and Japan ** Godzilla, King of the Monsters (comic book), a comic book series published by Marvel Comics ** Godzilla: King of the Monsters in 3D, an unproduced American film ** Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019 film), a 2019 American film ==See also== * Godzilla, nicknamed "the King of the Monsters"
title: King of the Monsters
